description: Try our easy to follow Beef Bulgogi recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Beef Bulgogi Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 slices light tasty cheese, cut into thin strips
300g king brown, shiitake and oyster mushrooms, sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Thinly slice the beef across the grain. Place in a bowl with marinade, stir to coat and set aside for 20 minutes.
Cook noodles in boiling water for 8 minutes or until soft. Drain and transfer to a bowl. Add soy sauce and sesame oil.

Heat a heavy-based frying pan over medium-high heat. Add half the oil and the onion. Stir-fry for 2 minutes or until onion is translucent. Add mushroom and capsicum. Season with salt. Cook, tossing frequently, for 2 minutes or until softened. Transfer to the noodles.
Heat remaining oil. Stir-fry beef for a few minutes or until just cooked. Add noodles and vegetables. Toss to reheat.
Divide beef mixture among lettuce leaves. Garnish with sesame seeds and spring onion, then serve with kimchi.
